jline
Interface ConsoleOperations

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConsoleReader, Terminal
public interface ConsoleOperations

Symbolic constants for Console operations and virtual key bindings.

Author:
Marc Prud'hommeaux
See Also:
KeyEvent
